user_instruction: 'Send an email to the parents about coordinating the Oakwood Owlets'"'"' group project. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Coordinating the Oakwood Owlets Group Project – Your Input Needed

Dear Oakwood Owlet Families,

I hope you and your children are doing well! As we kick off the Owlets’ upcoming group project, I’d like to gather a few details from you so we can make sure every student is set up for success and all parent volunteers are on the same page.

Could you please reply with the information below by Friday, [date]?

1. Student availability
   • Any dates/times in the next three weeks when your child is NOT available for after-school collaboration (virtual or in-person).

2. Preferred roles & interests
   • Has your child expressed interest in a particular role (researcher, designer, presenter, etc.)?
   • Does your child have any special skills or resources they’d like to contribute?

3. Parent support
   • Are you able to help supervise a work session, provide materials (poster boards, art supplies, tech), or assist with transportation?
   • If so, which days/times generally work best for you?

For a full project overview, timeline, and rubric, please check the “Owlets Group Project” page in our class Notion workspace. I’ve also copied the high-level milestones to the class Google Calendar for easy reference.

Thank you for taking a moment to fill in these details. Your prompt response will help us pair students effectively, schedule work sessions, and ensure the project runs smoothly. As always, feel free to let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Warmly,

Jane [Last Name]
Oakwood Elementary – Grade [ ] Teacher
[jane@example.com]   |   [School Phone]

final_output:
